meanings.definition: Organizes according to a systematic plan.
meanings.sent1: She methodizes her study schedule to ensure she covers all subjects.
meanings.sent2: He methodizes his work tasks by creating a detailed to-do list.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel methodizes its nut collection by storing them in different locations.
meanings.sent4: The teacher methodizes the classroom seating arrangement to promote better interaction.
meanings.sent5: The chef methodizes the ingredients before starting to cook for efficiency.

meanings.sent1: He methodizes his clothes in the closet by color and type.
meanings.sent2: She methodizes the books on the shelf alphabetically for easy access.
meanings.sent3: The robot methodizes the items in the warehouse with precision and speed.
meanings.sent4: The gardener methodizes the plants in the garden based on their sunlight needs.
meanings.sent5: The architect methodizes the building layout to maximize space usage.
